title: work
text:
Brookdale Senior Living

Director, Insights and Analytics, 2019-Present

Lead team of five in performing research and analysis for improving the lives of seniors with data.
Designed and manage the company’s most-used Tableau dashboard, a tool for quoting rates to prospects.
Developed covid-19 response data architecture, reporting cases daily to the executive leadership team.



Manager, Insights and Analytics, 2017-2019

Managed People Analytics from an FP&A perspective, delivering insights on the company’s labor strategy.
Built a culture of data science and research with R and Python.

title: work
text:
IDEMIA

Manager, Business Analysis, 2014-2017

Created the financial reporting system for the TSA Pre-Check program, reporting on the 1,200 locations at which you receive fingerprinting and background check services.


Education: MBA, Vanderbilt University; BA, Occidental College ___________________________________________________________________________________
Skills: Leading analytics and data science teams, Tableau, SQL, Strategic Finance ___________________________________________________________________________________

title: Podcast Interview: House of Data by Altos Research
text:
House of Data Podcast Interview


One under-estimated aspect of working in Senior Housing is the management of real estate data. For effective property management and ownership, the data teams need to be structured for effective collaboration – but not too much, as I talk about in this interview.

title: John Wilson
text: Hi, my name’s John Wilson, and I am a strategy and analytics executive based in Nashville, TN. Here you’ll find info about my work as director of insights and analytics with Brookdale Senior Living as well as my side projects. I am passionate about the intersection of people and technology, specifically in the hospitality and real estate industry. When I am not doing data, I am probably with my family trying new plant-based foods or out exploring Music City.

title: Podcast Interview: The Tech Trek by Elevano
text:
Tech Trek Podcast Interview


One of my proudest achievements have been the development of the analytics team at Brookdale. This interview covers some of the aspects of my experience there.

title: Tableau: Analyzing Airbnb inventory and pricing in Nashville, TN
